name: Camie
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn When your opponent activates an event or Trigger, you may activate this effect. If your opponent has 2 or more Life cards, trash the top card of both players' Life area.

effect.text: When your opponent activates an event or Trigger, you may activate this effect. If your opponent has 2 or more Life cards, trash the top card of both players' Life area.
conditions: opponent has 2 or more Life cards
